name: Sound Balling
description:
Sound Balling is a rhythmic 2D puzzle game where a player must hit all the white objects and make a short sound combination while doing so.

WHAT TO EXPECT

30 levels with unique sound combination and patterns. Find the correct angle to launch your ball, but be careful because you only have one try to calculate it! So basically - it's calculate and shoot. Once you do that, you can only watch your ball perform the balling symphony.

Train your logical thinking and perception with the objects while enjoying pleasant sounds of piano tiles as you hit each of them.
